item.description: Hey, Informal Nation! I wanted to see who might be interested in a six-person marathon relay (about 4.37 miles/7K each). The 26.2 Challenge is being held in Plymouth, MA on Saturday, April 28. It is billed as "one big party" and finishers get, among other things, a beer mug. This week through Friday, the RD generously offered us $50 off the entry fee, so it would come to just under $25 a person. We don't need all six to register, but let me know ASAP. Thanks! http://www.262challen...

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: 26.2 Challenge (marathon relay race for 6-person teams), 4-28-12
